content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great investment. What price are you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to rent the apartment for 500 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that price is much lower than what I'm looking for. I'm aiming for a higher rate, closer to 750 euros per month. Is that within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 750 euros is too high for me. I can offer 600 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While 600 euros is more reasonable, I still believe the apartment is worth 750 euros per month. It's a prime location with all the amenities you could need. Are you willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but 750 euros is still too high for me. I can offer 650 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: If you're willing to pay 650 euros per month, I might be able to consider it. However, I would need to discuss this with my financial advisor first. Can you give me some time to consult with them?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can wait for your response. Remember, the apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your patience, Mr. Abbasi. I'll get back to you as soon as I have an answer from my financial advisor. In the meantime, if you have any questions about the apartment or the neighborhood, feel free to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, I don't have any additional questions at the moment. I look forward to hearing from you.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
